text: Offshore drilling is a process where a oil and fossil fuels are drilled below the ocean or sea. This is very controversial as many believe it causes climate change and its harmful to the environment.Compton, Glenn, 10 Reasons Not to Drill for Oil Offshore of Florida, The Bradenton Times, January 14, 2018 This process began around 1981. ==References== Category:Petroleum Category:Technology
title: Offshore drilling
